snippet: The expropriation of Transportadora de Electricidad, which operates a large part of Bolivia’s national electricity grid, is another abrupt setback for Spanish companies in Latin America.
abstract: Bolivia seizes control of the assets there of Spanish utility Red Electrica de Espana; Bolivia's president Evo Morales says decision is part of a broader effort to regain ownership of the nation's natural resources and basic services; expropriation is another setback for Spanish companies in Latin America.
lead_paragraph: The expropriation of Transportadora de Electricidad, which operates a large part of Bolivia’s national electricity grid, is another abrupt setback for Spanish companies in Latin America.

headline.main: Bolivia Seizes Local Assets of Spanish Utility
headline.print_headline: Bolivia Takes Control of Spanish Electric Company’s Assets
